function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reduction in tourism revenue for PCAs due to travel restrictions and decline in global tourism","Impact":"Decline in funding for conservation finance, reduced salaries for tourism employees, and reduced income for small businesses","Mitigation":"Diversification of funding sources, development of alternative income generation strategies, and investment in local community engagement","Technologies":"Remote sensing technology for monitoring and enforcement, online engagement platforms for virtual tourism experiences","People":"Conservation organizations, tourism employees, small business owners","Owner":"Conservation organizations, government authorities, local community organizations"}]}
